Explore your design

Source: R/design_helper_functions.R, R/design_print_summary.R
post_design.Rd

Explore your design

Print code to recreate a design

print_code(design)

# S3 method for design
print(x, verbose = TRUE, ...)

# S3 method for design
summary(object, verbose = TRUE, ...)

Arguments

design

A design object, typically created using the + operator
x

a design object, typically created using the + operator
verbose

an indicator for printing a long summary of the design, defaults to TRUE
...

optional arguments to be sent to summary function
object

a design object created using the + operator

Examples


design <-
  declare_model(
    N = 500, 
    U = rnorm(N),
    potential_outcomes(Y ~ U + Z * rnorm(N, 2, 2))
  ) +
  declare_sampling(S = complete_rs(N, n = 250)) +
  declare_inquiry(ATE = mean(Y_Z_1 - Y_Z_0)) +
  declare_assignment(Z = complete_ra(N, m = 25)) +
  declare_measurement(Y = reveal_outcomes(Y ~ Z)) +
  declare_estimator(Y ~ Z, inquiry = "my_inquiry")

design

#> 
#> Design Summary
#> 
#> Step 1 (model): declare_model(N = 500, U = rnorm(N), potential_outcomes(Y ~ U +     Z * rnorm(N, 2, 2))) 
#> 
#> N = 500 
#> 
#> Added variable: ID 
#>  N_missing N_unique     class
#>          0      500 character
#> 
#> Added variable: U 
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -2.86  -0.08    0 3.07 1.05         0      500
#> 
#> Added variable: Y_Z_0 
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -2.86  -0.08    0 3.07 1.05         0      500
#> 
#> Added variable: Y_Z_1 
#>    min median mean   max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -5.63   2.02 2.01 10.77 2.22         0      500
#> 
#> Step 2 (sampling): declare_sampling(S = complete_rs(N, n = 250)) ---------------
#> 
#> N = 250 (250 subtracted) 
#> 
#> Added variable: S 
#>     1
#>   250
#>  1.00
#> 
#> Altered variable: ID 
#>   Before: 
#>  N_missing N_unique     class
#>          0      500 character
#> 
#>   After:
#>  N_missing N_unique     class
#>          0      250 character
#> 
#> Altered variable: U 
#>   Before: 
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -2.86  -0.08    0 3.07 1.05         0      500
#> 
#>   After:
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -2.47  -0.04 0.02 3.07 1.08         0      250
#> 
#> Altered variable: Y_Z_0 
#>   Before: 
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -2.86  -0.08    0 3.07 1.05         0      500
#> 
#>   After:
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -2.47  -0.04 0.02 3.07 1.08         0      250
#> 
#> Altered variable: Y_Z_1 
#>   Before: 
#>    min median mean   max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -5.63   2.02 2.01 10.77 2.22         0      500
#> 
#>   After:
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -4.86   1.92  1.9 6.95 2.18         0      250
#> 
#> Step 3 (inquiry): declare_inquiry(ATE = mean(Y_Z_1 - Y_Z_0)) -------------------
#> 
#> A single draw of the inquiry:
#>  inquiry estimand
#>      ATE  1.88251
#> 
#> Step 4 (assignment): declare_assignment(Z = complete_ra(N, m = 25)) ------------
#> 
#> Added variable: Z 
#>     0    1
#>   225   25
#>  0.90 0.10
#> 
#> Step 5 (measurement): declare_measurement(Y = reveal_outcomes(Y ~ Z)) ----------
#> 
#> Added variable: Y 
#>    min median mean  max  sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -3.22   0.08 0.17 6.95 1.3         0      250
#> 
#> Step 6 (estimator): declare_estimator(Y ~ Z, inquiry = "my_inquiry") -----------
#> 
#> Formula: Y ~ Z 
#> 
#> A single draw of the estimator:
#>  estimator term estimate std.error statistic     p.value  conf.low conf.high
#>  estimator    Z 1.307957 0.4439113  2.946438 0.003520636 0.4336403  2.182274
#>   df outcome    inquiry
#>  248       Y my_inquiry
#> 

df <- draw_data(design)

estimates <- draw_estimates(design)
inquiries <- draw_inquiries(design)

print_code(design)

#> model <- declare_model(N = 500, U = rnorm(N), potential_outcomes(Y ~ U + Z * rnorm(N, 2, 2))) 
#> 
#> sampling <- declare_sampling(S = complete_rs(N, n = 250)) 
#> 
#> ATE <- declare_inquiry(ATE = mean(Y_Z_1 - Y_Z_0)) 
#> 
#> assignment <- declare_assignment(Z = complete_ra(N, m = 25)) 
#> 
#> measurement <- declare_measurement(Y = reveal_outcomes(Y ~ Z)) 
#> 
#> estimator <- declare_estimator(Y ~ Z, inquiry = "my_inquiry") 
#> 
#> my_design <- construct_design(steps = steps) 
#> 


my_population <- declare_model(N = 100)

my_assignment <- declare_assignment(Z = complete_ra(N, m = 50))

my_design <- my_population + my_assignment

print_code(my_design)

#> my_population <- declare_model(N = 100) 
#> 
#> my_assignment <- declare_assignment(Z = complete_ra(N, m = 50)) 
#> 
#> my_design <- construct_design(steps = steps) 
#> 


my_model <- 
  declare_model(
    N = 500, 
    noise = rnorm(N),
    Y_Z_0 = noise, 
    Y_Z_1 = noise + rnorm(N, mean = 2, sd = 2)
  )

my_sampling <- declare_sampling(S = complete_rs(N, n = 250))

my_assignment <- declare_assignment(Z = complete_ra(N, m = 25))

my_inquiry <- declare_inquiry(ATE = mean(Y_Z_1 - Y_Z_0))

my_estimator <- declare_estimator(Y ~ Z, inquiry = my_inquiry)

my_reveal <- declare_measurement(Y = reveal_outcomes(Y ~ Z))

design <- my_model +
  my_sampling +
  my_inquiry +
  my_assignment +
  my_reveal +
  my_estimator

summary(design)

#> 
#> Design Summary
#> 
#> Step 1 (model): declare_model(N = 500, noise = rnorm(N), Y_Z_0 = noise, Y_Z_1 = noise +     rnorm(N, mean = 2, sd = 2)) 
#> 
#> N = 500 
#> 
#> Added variable: ID 
#>  N_missing N_unique     class
#>          0      500 character
#> 
#> Added variable: noise 
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -2.68   0.03 0.01 3.35 1.03         0      500
#> 
#> Added variable: Y_Z_0 
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -2.68   0.03 0.01 3.35 1.03         0      500
#> 
#> Added variable: Y_Z_1 
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -4.64   2.11 2.12 9.35 2.28         0      500
#>

#>   250
#>  1.00

#>   After:

#>          0      250 character

#>   Before: 
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique

#> 
#>   After:
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -2.68   0.05 0.03 3.03 1.05         0      250
#> 
#> Altered variable: Y_Z_0 
#>   Before: 
#>    min median mean  max   sd N_missing N_unique
#>  -2.68   0.03 0.01 3.35 1.03         0      500
#> 
#>   After:
